# Development History

This directory contains historical documentation files from the project's development phases.

## Contents

- **PHASE2_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of Phase 2 improvements (Caching and Async support)
- **PHASE2_COMPLETE.md** - Completion report for Phase 2
- **PHASE3_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of Phase 3 improvements (dataclasses migration)
- **FINAL_SUMMARY.md** - Final summary of all improvement phases
- **IMPROVEMENT_PLAN.md** - Original improvement plan
- **REFACTORING_REPORT.md** - Refactoring report
- **TESTS_SUMMARY.md** - Test coverage summary
- **DOCS_UPDATE_SUMMARY.md** - Documentation update summary
- **PYPROJECT_MIGRATION.md** - Migration to pyproject.toml
- **README_MIGRATION.md** - README migration notes

These files are kept for historical reference and may contain outdated information.
